script:
nuke.toNode('NoOp1').knob('knobChanged').setValue('n=nuke.thisNode()
k=nuke.thisKnob()
if k.name() in ["lga_firstFrame_int", "lga_lastFrame_int", "lga_frameCount"]:
 rife=nuke.toNode("RIFE1")
 if rife:
 try:
 fc=int(n["lga_frameCount"].value())
 tk=rife["timingFrame"]
 tk.clearAnimated()
 tk.setAnimated()
 tk.setValueAt(1, 1)
 tk.setValueAt(2, fc)
 except:
 nuke.message("Error setting keyframes")') nuke.toNode('LGA_Morph').knob('knobChanged').setValue('n=nuke.thisNode()
k=nuke.thisKnob()
if k.name() in ["lga_firstFrame","lga_lastFrame","lga_frameRangeIn","lga_frameRangeOut","python_button","python_button_1","python_button_2"]:
 data=nuke.toNode("NoOp_Morph")
 rife=nuke.toNode("RIFE_Morph")
 merge=nuke.toNode("Merge_Morph")
 try:
 fi=int(data["lga_firstFrame_int"].value())
 fo=int(data["lga_lastFrame_int"].value())
 fc=int(data["lga_frameCount"].value())
 if rife:
 tk=rife["timingFrame"]
 tk.clearAnimated()
 tk.setAnimated()
 tk.setValueAt(fi, fi)
 tk.setValueAt(fi+1, fo)
 for node in [rife, merge]:
 if node:
 dk=node["disable"]
 dk.clearAnimated()
 dk.setAnimated()
 dk.setValueAt(1, fi)
 dk.setValueAt(0, fi+1)
 dk.setValueAt(0, fo-1)
 dk.setValueAt(1, fo)
 except Exception as e:
 nuke.message("Keyframe error: {}".format(e))')
